Package me.gamercoder215.socketmc.spigot

Class SocketPlayer

java.lang.Object
me.gamercoder215.socketmc.spigot.SocketPlayer
public final class SocketPlayer extends Object
Represents a player connected to the server with SocketMC installed.

    • registerEvents

      public static void registerEvents(@NotNull @NotNull Player p)
      Registers the packet injector for the player. Please note that a Instruction.PING instruction must be sent at least once in order for the client to start sending events.
      Parameters:
      p - The player to register the events for.
